moves.1. Nf3 d5 2. c4 Nf6 3. e3 e6 4. a3 Be7 5: Early castling. So, hoping to attack the white side quickly.
moves.17... Re8 18. Bd4: Here, do not need to move the Bishop. A move is wasted. If black side Bishop will be moved to f6 then they can be exchanged.
moves.18... Bf6 19. Be2 Bxd4: As expected it happened. Bishops will be exchanged !
moves.20. Qxd4 Nf6 21. O-O Qd6 22. f4: Too aggressive ! Black side may get little advantage.
moves.22... exf3 e.p. 23. Bxf3 Rd8 24. Bxd5 Nx: Not  good move ! Black Queen can protect the King and may be pawns will get better positioning.
moves.25... Qg6 26. Qxg6+ hxg6: yes, it happened. Now, black side is ina better position to attack the opposition.
moves.27. h4: Missed ! Forgot about e3, Horse is looking to kick it away.
moves.27... Nxe3: Not only that but also white rook has to move. Otherwise, ...
moves.29. Re2 Rd7: It looks like Black is protecting c7 and f7 from the white rook. That time I do not want to change my structure. White pieces got locked somewhat and if white rook is moved black rook will do with the white horse.
moves.30. Ne4: Bad move ! Leaving the black rook to threaten the white King !
moves.30... Rd1+ 31. Re1: Nice ! White side has only option of moving a piece without quiting the game.
moves.31... Rxe1#: It's all over. kapila is on top with steering the Black side. I think it is a nice game. Apart from the simple mistakes I think both sides did well but black side is smarter !

gameName: Simple mistake would give big troubles in a chess game
